function.name: read_memory
function.description: Read the full content of a file from the vault, memory, or skills directory.

filename.description: The name of the file to read (e.g., 'project_plan.md').

function.name: run_make
function.description: Execute a predefined make target. Only targets defined in the root Makefile are allowed. You cannot run arbitrary shell commands.

function.name: write_note
function.description: Save a new note to the data/memory directory as a Markdown file.

filename.description: The name of the file (e.g., report.md).

content.description: The content of the note in Markdown format.

function.name: get_context_stats
function.description: Get detailed statistics about the current context window usage, token consumption, and rate limits for the active model. Use this to monitor token usage and avoid hitting rate limits.

model.description: The model name to check stats for (optional, defaults to current primary model).

function.name: create-boss-skills
function.description: Create a new skill for the Boss Agent by generating stubs and registering it in the system.

NAME.description: The name of the new skill (e.g., 'pdf-summarizer')

PROMPT.description: The requirements and description of the skill's functionality

function.name: jules
function.description: Interact with the Jules AI agent for complex coding tasks, PR reviews, or repository-wide changes.

action.description: The action to perform with Jules.

prompt.description: The instruction or message for Jules (used with create, send-message).

repo.description: The GitHub repository name (owner/repo) for the session.

sessionId.description: The ID of an existing Jules session.

extraArgs.description: Any additional flags or arguments for the jules client.
